entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
